Description:
Tasks include but not limited to:Continuously scanning the market to support decision making in terms of pricing and positioning
Monitor competitors’ marketing communication tactics to provide analysis and recommendations-         Develop & execute the SEO strategy for the business-         Manage social media channels as needed & develop copy and designs as requiredContact leads generated from online marketing activities
Handle communication with these leads starting from the day they submit their contact information through the website’s form, close deals whenever applicable and stay in touch with them until they receive their apartmentsBenefits include:Salary + Commission
Flexible working hours
Friendly work environmentSkills
Skills:
Have the analytical skills required for the Marketing part of the job
Have the organizational skills required for the Sales part of the job
Must possess persuasive abilities to draw in more clients.
Have experience with SEO and Social Media or at least demonstrate potential
Be super at time management
